巊字的基本解释

巊
yǐng
〔巊冥〕晦暗不明，如“尔其山泽，则嵬嶷嶢屼，巊巊郁岪。”
山名。

巊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐng］
［《廣韻》烟涬切，上迥，影。］
(1)见“巊冥”。
(2)见“巊”

巊字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　巊； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页322第27
【廣韻】煙涬切【集韻】於郢切，?音瀴。【集韻】巊㟰，山貌。【左思·吳都賦】其山巊溟鬱?。【註】山氣暗昧之狀。

巊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
巊字的起名意思

暂无。

巊
Basic explanation of words
巊
yǐng
〔巊明〕It is dark and unclear, such as "Erqishanze, then you will be 嵬嶷峣屼, 巊巊yu岪."
Mountain name.
巊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐng］
["Guangyun" smoke and cut, on the jong, shadow. ]
(1) See "Xianming".
(2) See "巊"

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji] [Mountain Character Department] 　巊; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 322 27
[Guang Yun] Yan Liqie [Ji Yun] Yu Yingqie,? Yin Deng. [Jiyun] 巊㟰, mountain appearance. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Its mountains are full of depression. [Note] The ambiguity of the mountain air.
